article_text:
Your editorial “The Decline of ObamaCare” (Oct. 26) makes reference to the “many rational adults . . . willing to pay a fine.” What would make anybody believe they are willing to do so, or even have any intention to do so?

The law that Nancy Pelosi failed to read provides no methodology for effective enforcement by the IRS. It cannot garnish wages, attach property or financial accounts, or take an offender to any court—civil, criminal or tax. All the IRS can do is write demand letters (which have to stop after 10 years) or...
